overview: Anaganaga Oka Kurradu is an Romance based movie. In which, Sachidananda Murthy alias Sachin (Rohit) is an enthusiastic youngster and an aspiring cricketer. He is son of a car driver (Chalapati Rao) and belongs to a lower-middle-class family that lives in a slum area. His father wants him to study well and earn a government job. But Sachin wants to become a national level cricketer and play for India.
title: Anaganaga O Kurradu
